Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class SequenceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.DiagramView
      • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.SequenceView

  • public class SequenceView
extends DiagramView
    A class of sequence diagram views. Sequence diagram views display diagrams as a composite of parties with messages sent between them. The parties are drawn in a top row, while the messages are drawn in the rows underneath this top row. Below each party, a lifeline is drawn.

    • Field Summary
